h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong White Seashell Waist Chain Location
content: The White Seashell Waist Chain is randomly dropped from Brutes within the Flaming Mountains. Simply farm them around The Emerald Hall in Furnace Valley until it drops.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'White_Seashell_Waist_Chain.md', within the main section titled 'White Seashell Waist Chain', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong White Seashell Waist Chain Location'.
The content is as follows:
The White Seashell Waist Chain is randomly dropped from Brutes within the Flaming Mountains. Simply farm them around The Emerald Hall in Furnace Valley until it drops.
